description.value: When armed with two single-handed weapons (such as pistols or one-handed melee weapons), they ignore the -20 penalty for Two-Weapon Fighting

system.benefit: When armed with two single-handed weapons (such as pistols or one-handed melee weapons), they ignore the -20 penalty for Two-Weapon Fighting

prerequisites.text: Agility 45, Ambidextrious, BS 40 or WS 40, Two Weapon Wielder (Melee, Ranged)
